title: Pregnancy after 35
creator_credit: Polymorph Films, Alvin Fiering and Gwen Brown
brief_description: Uses interviews with middle aged mothers and information from Carole S. McCauley’s book, to allay the fears of women contemplating pregnancy after 35. Shows emotional and physical reactions to pregnancy at this age, discusses Down’s syndrome and demonstrates an amniocentesis which test foetal chromosomes.
